jobs.title: Web Developer
tasks: Worked as part of team of front-end developers to improve and maintain Learning Suite, a learning management system (LMS) used daily by approximately 35,000 BYU faculty members and students
Implemented user interface and functionality using HTML, CSS, JavaScript ( jQuery, Backbone.js, Handlebars.js ), and PHP
Personally implemented site-wide audio and video support update, including adding codec detection, in-browser feature detection, and QuickTime integration

jobs.title: Data Analyst
tasks: Assisted in data analysis and report creation, using Microsoft Excel and VBA
Created a VBA script to automate the creation of a monthly budget report

jobs.title: Bridge Inspection Assistant
tasks: Assisted in inspection of bridges, including taking photos and completing reports
Edited photos for bridge reports using Adobe Photoshop to adjust brightness, sharpness, and contrast
Entered data and created graphics and reports using Microsoft Excel and VBA
